secText: The parts of a circuit can be represented with symbols, as shown in the table.

In the bottom figure, we show a circuit diagram. The battery’s symbol has plus and minus signs, indicating the positive and negative terminals of the battery. Current is shown with an arrow, indicating the direction of conventional current.

Also shown are the symbols for a resistor and a switch. In the upper diagram, the switch is shown in its open position (off: no current flows) and in its closed (on: current flows) position in the lower diagram.
